plot: Facing tough times and the task of solely providing for his family, Jerome, and his best friend Diego embark on a dark journey into the depths of the criminal drug trade when they make the fateful decision to start dealing crack.
title: Hard
plot_es: Facing tough times and the task of solely providing for his family, Jerome, and his best friend Diego embark on a dark journey into the depths of the criminal drug trade when they make the fateful decision to start dealing crack.
plot_en: Facing tough times and the task of solely providing for his family, Jerome, and his best friend Diego embark on a dark journey into the depths of the criminal drug trade when they make the fateful decision to start dealing crack.
